Class TetrisBoard

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.core.TetrisBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Board
public class TetrisBoard extends Object implements Board
Implementation of the Board interface for Tetris game logic. Manages the game board state, piece movement, rotation, line clearing, and special features such as hold piece, ghost piece, and garbage block spawning.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Phung Yu Jie

    • clearBottomRows

      public boolean clearBottomRows(int numRows)
      Clears the bottom N rows and drops all blocks above down. Used by RPG abilities to clear rows from the bottom.
      Parameters:
      numRows - The number of bottom rows to remove
      Returns:
      true if any blocks were removed, false otherwise

    • spawnGarbageBlocks

      public int spawnGarbageBlocks(int numBlocks, int level)
      Spawn random garbage brick shapes that drop from the top and land on existing blocks. Complete brick shapes (I, O, T, S, Z, J, L) fall down and stack on top of existing blocks.
      Specified by:
      spawnGarbageBlocks in interface Board
      Parameters:
      numBlocks - number of garbage bricks to spawn (each brick is a complete shape)
      level - current RPG level (affects spawn pattern)
      Returns:
      number of blocks actually spawned (counts individual blocks in each brick)
